Title: Relates to uninsured and underinsured motorist coverage for police agencies
Summary: Requires bodily injury be covered under supplementary uninsured/underinsured motorist insurance coverage for police vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง3420, Ins L; amd ยง388, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to supplementary uninsured and underinsured motorist coverage for police agencies
